CHAT.comment: child and mom play hand slapping game.
the child's sister and INV come in the room with degu.
INV motions to sister.
child looks into top of cage.
child taps top of cage.
child doesn't respond.
child points to bedding.
child points toward computer box.
child lays his head on the table and touches the glass.
child makes clawing motion.
child peers into cage.
mom smiles.
child moves cage slowly towards him.
child moves cage slowly away and giggles.
child keeps pushing cage towards mom and the degu moves around.
child moves cage to middle.
INV takes degu from table.
INV sets meerkat on table.
mom and child pet and examine meerkat.
child examines meerkat.
child examines meerkat closely.
child walks meerkat across table.
mom touches the stomach area of meerkat.
child turns over meerkat and looks at fur.
child hugs meerkat.
mom sets meerkat up and looks at it.
mom talks for meerkat.
child takes the meerkat's hand.
mom points to tail.
mom pets tail.
child takes meerkat and turns it over pointing to the base of the tail.
INV comes in with sister.
child hands INV meerkat.
INV sets car on table.
child points to back of car.
child points to driver's seat.
mom points to lights on top of car.
child turns head to the side.
child points to back of car.
child opens trunk.
child points to back.
child wheels car into mom's arm.
mom points to rear spoiler.
child plays with back of car.
child goes over to covered computer box with sign on it.
child is referring to sign on computer box cover.
child lays on side seeming bored.
mom touches inside of car.
child points car up on its back tires.
child turns car over and looks at it closely.
mom takes car and points it vertical then horizontal.
child pretends to fly car off table.
INV takes car.
INV uncovers starfish tank.
child goes over and looks into tank.
mom comes and leans over child to peer into tank.
mom takes child's arms which were holding tank.
mom points to things floating in the water.
mom points to side of cage.
mom points to something in cage.
child sighs heavily.
mom points to something in the back of tank.
mom points to various spots in cage and then at the light.
mom points to rocks.
child looks into cage.
INV and sister come into room.
INV covers tank.
child walks over and points to covered computer box.
INV uncovers computer box.
INV and sister leave the room and child sits in front of computer box.
mom joins him sitting by box.
computer box beeps.
child touches lights and sensors computer box beeps and flashes lights.
computer box beeps.
child continues touching and pressing the box.
mom points to the lights.
mom puts finger on the light at the top of box.
child doesn't respond and mom starts counting.
child points as he counts.
child does not respond and continues touching box.
child turns head sideways.
INV opens door and hits mom's chair.
INV sets robodog on the floor.
robodog's head moves.
child goes over and touches robodog and it moves.
table blocks the camera's view of child and robodog but it seems as though the child is petting the dog and the mom speaks for the dog.
robodog walks.
sounds as though the child is holding a part of the dog that is trying to move, making a clicking noise.
child seems to be holding or restricting robodog's movements.
mom reaches over.
dog walks away.
child follows robodog and tries to open it.
mom takes robodog and sets it on its feet.
the battery is dead and the robodog sits back on its heels.
they touch robodog in different spots.
INV comes in the room.
INV takes robodog and leaves.
